strategy: Implement a Random Forest Classifier with hyperparameter tuning using GridSearchCV.

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train[features].fillna(train[features].median())
X_train['Sex'] = X_train['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna('S').map({'S': 0, 'C': 1, 'Q': 2})

y_train = train['Survived']

X_test = test[features].fillna(test[features].median())
X_test['Sex'] = X_test['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_test['Embarked'] = X_test['Embarked'].fillna('S').map({'S': 0, 'C': 1, 'Q': 2})

# Set up and train Random Forest Classifier with GridSearchCV
param_grid = {
    'n_estimators': [50, 100, 200],
    'max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30],
    'min_samples_split': [2, 5, 10]
}
rf = RandomForestClassifier()
grid_search = GridSearchCV(rf, param_grid, cv=5)
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
y_pred = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train[features].fillna(train[features].mean()) # Changed to mean for non-numeric features
X_train['Sex'] = X_train['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna('S').map({'S': 0, 'C': 1, 'Q': 2})

y_train = train['Survived']

X_test = test[features].fillna(test[features].mean()) # Changed to mean for non-numeric features
X_test['Sex'] = X_test['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_test['Embarked'] = X_test['Embarked'].fillna('S').map({'S': 0, 'C': 1, 'Q': 2})

# Set up and train Random Forest Classifier with GridSearchCV
param_grid = {
    'n_estimators': [50, 100, 200],
    'max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30],
    'min_samples_split': [2, 5, 10]
}
rf = RandomForestClassifier()
grid_search = GridSearchCV(rf, param_grid, cv=5)
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
y_pred = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train[features].fillna(train[features].mean())
X_train['Sex'] = X_train['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0] # Changed to mode for non-numeric features

y_train = train['Survived']

X_test = test[features].fillna(test[features].mean())
X_test['Sex'] = X_test['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_test['Embarked'] = X_test['Embarked'].mode()[0] # Changed to mode for non-numeric features

# Set up and train Random Forest Classifier with GridSearchCV
param_grid = {
    'n_estimators': [50, 100, 200],
    'max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30],
    'min_samples_split': [2, 5, 10]
}
rf = RandomForestClassifier()
grid_search = GridSearchCV(rf, param_grid, cv=5)
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
y_pred = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train[features].fillna(train[features].mean())
X_train['Sex'] = X_train['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0])

y_train = train['Survived']

X_test = test[features].fillna(test[features].mean())
X_test['Sex'] = X_test['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_test['Embarked'] = X_test['Embarked'].fillna(X_test['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Set up and train Random Forest Classifier with GridSearchCV
param_grid = {
    'n_estimators': [50, 100, 200],
    'max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30],
    'min_samples_split': [2, 5, 10]
}
rf = RandomForestClassifier()
grid_search = GridSearchCV(rf, param_grid, cv=5)
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
y_pred = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train[features].fillna(train[features].mean())
X_train['Sex'] = X_train['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0])

y_train = train['Survived']

X_test = test[features].fillna(test[features].mean())
X_test['Sex'] = X_test['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_test['Embarked'] = X_test['Embarked'].fillna(X_test['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Set up and train Random Forest Classifier with GridSearchCV
param_grid = {
    'n_estimators': [50, 100, 200],
    'max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30],
    'min_samples_split': [2, 5, 10]
}
rf = RandomForestClassifier()
grid_search = GridSearchCV(rf, param_grid, cv=5)
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
y_pred = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train[features].fillna(train[features].mean())
X_train['Sex'] = X_train['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0])

y_train = train['Survived']

X_test = test[features].fillna(test[features].mean())
X_test['Sex'] = X_test['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
X_test['Embarked'] = X_test['Embarked'].fillna(X_test['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Set up and train Random Forest Classifier with GridSearchCV
param_grid = {
    'n_estimators': [50, 100, 200],
    'max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30],
    'min_samples_split': [2, 5, 10]
}
rf = RandomForestClassifier()
grid_search = GridSearchCV(rf, param_grid, cv=5)
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
y_pred = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE
